fetch.name: fetch
fetch.description: Loads data from the specified resource.
syntax: fetch dataObject [, bucket: bucket, â€¦] [, from] [, to] [, timeframe] [, samplingRatio] [, scanLimitGBytes]

parameters.name: dataObject
parameters.description: The data source object to query

parameters.name: timeframe
parameters.description: The timeframe to fetch data from.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The start time for fetching data.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The end time for fetching data.

parameters.name: samplingRatio
parameters.description: Sampling happens vertically across the data, resulting in the selection of a subset of Log records, according to the specified parameter.

parameters.name: scanLimitGBytes
parameters.description: Controls the amount of uncompressed data to be read by the fetch stage. The default value is 500GB unless specified otherwise. If set to -1, all data available in the query time range is analyzed.

parameters.name: bucket
parameters.description: Allows to limit the data sources to a list of specified buckets, possibly improving the query performance.

data.name: data
data.description: Generates sample data during query runtime.

parameters.name: records
parameters.description: A list of record expressions. Either records or JSON has to be specified.

parameters.name: json
parameters.description: A string that defines either a single JSON object or a JSON array. Either records or JSON has to be specified.

describe.name: describe
describe.description: Describes the on-read schema extraction definition for a given data object.

parameters.name: dataObject
parameters.description: The data source object to query

load.name: load
load.description: Loads data from the specified resource. The load command is used with lookup data.

parameters.name: tabularFile
parameters.description: The name of the tabular file to load.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of skipped records.

smartscapeNodes.name: smartscapeNodes
smartscapeNodes.description: Loads Smartscape nodes using a type pattern (use * for all types).

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
The node type. You can filter types of nodes using patterns:
- using * will match any node type.
- specific node types can be specified without quotes ("").
- patterns need to be wrapped in double quotes (""). Patterns support prefix (...*) , postfix (*...) and contains notation (*...*).

parameters.name: timeframe
parameters.description: The desired timeframe (if not specified, global timeframe is used).

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The start time for fetching data.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The end time for fetching data.

smartscapeEdges.name: smartscapeEdges
smartscapeEdges.description: Loads Smartscape edges using an edge type pattern (use * for all types).

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
The edge type that represents the relationship between two nodes. You can filter the edge type using patterns:
- using * will match any edge type.
- specific edge types can be specified without quotes ("").
- patterns need to be wrapped in double quotes (""). Patterns support prefix (...*) , postfix (*...) and contains notation (*...*).

parameters.name: timeframe
parameters.description: The desired timeframe (if not specified, global timeframe is used).

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The start time for fetching data.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The end time for fetching data.
